Package oh_hecc.game_parts

Interface MVCGameDataInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameDataObject
public interface MVCGameDataInterface extends Heccable
A lighterweight interface for the GameDataObject that will have the functionality needed by PassageModel.java
Currently very lightweight because it doesn't do anything yet.

    • getStartUUID

      Optional<UUID> getStartUUID()
      Obtains the UUID of the start passage. Will not forcibly create a start passage.
      Returns:
      an Optional holding the UUID of the start passage (if it exists)

      Path getSavePath()
      Gets the path to where this object is saved

      savePath

    • putPassageOntoMap

      void putPassageOntoMap​(PassageEditingInterface p)
      Puts the specified PassageEditingInterface object onto the PassageMap.
      Parameters:
      p - the passage to put on the map.

    • getPassageFromUUID

      PassageEditingInterface getPassageFromUUID​(UUID uuidOfPassageToGet)
      Obtains the PassageEditingInterface object for the passage with the given UUID
      Parameters:
      uuidOfPassageToGet - the UUID of the PassageEditingInterface object which is needed.
      Returns:
      the appropriate PassageEditingInterface object.

    • getUUIDsOfPassagesThatLinkToThisOne

      Set<UUID> getUUIDsOfPassagesThatLinkToThisOne​(UUID destination)
      Obtains the UUIDs of the passages that link to the destination passage
      Parameters:
      destination - the UUID of the passage that we're trying to find the 'parent' passages of
      Returns:
      the UUIDs of all the 'parent' passages

    • openPassageEditWindow

      EditorWindowInterface openPassageEditWindow​(UUID passage)
      Creates a PassageEditorWindow for the given passage (and the entire gamedata)
      Parameters:
      passage - the UUID of the passage in question which is having its PassageEditorWindow opened
      Returns:
      a PassageEditorWindow which allows a user to edit the passage in question

    • openMetadataEditWindow

      EditorWindowInterface openMetadataEditWindow()
      Creates a MetadataEditorWindow for this game
      Returns:
      the MetadataEditorWindow allowing the user to edit the metadata

    • saveTheHecc

      void saveTheHecc() throws IOException
      Saves the .hecc
      Throws:
      IOException - if it couldn't be saved.

    • saveTheHeccCheckingValidity

      void saveTheHeccCheckingValidity() throws IOException, HeccCeption
      Attempts to check the hecc for validity, and overwrites the _lastValidVersion backup of the .hecc file (only overwrites the '_lastValidVersion' backup if it is valid)
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an IO problem preventing it from being saved.
      HeccCeption - if there's a problem with the .hecc file that renders it invalid.
